title: Efavirenz
summary: Efavirenz (EFV), sold under the brand names Sustiva among others, is  an antiretroviral medication used to treat and prevent HIV/AIDS.[1] It is generally recommended for use with other antiretrovirals.[1] It may be used for prevention after a needlestick injury or other potential exposure.[1] It is sold both by itself and in combination as efavirenz/emtricitabine/tenofovir.[1] It is taken by mouth.[1]
